column4: anyone know how to get an apt-get dist_uprgade to work when its saying there are packages being held back ??? I am trying to upgrade from warty to hoary
the ratbag is jivving me
apt-get dist-upgrade anyone ????????????????????????
is it "upgrade" or "dist-upgrade" that is holding packages back?
dist-upgrade
which packages?
please query me and paste the output
the box in question is at home and I am at work....using my Powerbook
okay.  I'm somewhat surprised, frankly.  upgrade might hold the packages back, but I would expect dist-upgrade not to.
is there anyway to get more verbose info on which dependancies are holding me back
you can use the "-u" switch
my warty box here dist-upgraded to hoary just fine
ok I'll try it tonite thanx
you can also use the -s switch.  (-u = --show-upgrade, -s = --simulate)
-u = --show-upgraded, that is ;)
cool i should have RTFM'd
are you an official Ubuntu dev ?
no, I'm an motu
excuse my French, what the $^#@$%@# is motu
heh, sorry.  We maintain packages in universe, but not main
why do you ask?  just curious, or did you have a concern?
just interested
okay :)
